data.name: Kach
data.detailed_description:
Look for your loved one, but there is a "kach".
Kach is a First-person Horror Walking Simulator.

Features:

  • Explore - Navigate an abandoned house, and find secrets along the journey.
  • Environmental Storytelling - Interact and examine interesting objects and unveil the mystery.
  • Unique Visuals - Enjoy an atmospheric experience in a pixelated monochromatic art style.
  • Story - Jump into an immersive world as you uncover the truth.

This game was developed by USC Games in collaboration with Berklee College of Music and Otis College of Art and Design.

Playtime is around 12 - 20 minutes depending on your playstyle.

data.short_description: On a task to find your sister you find yourself exploring an old abandoned house. But you soon find out that things are not as they seem.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Pentium (R) Dual-Core T4200 @ 2.00 GHz (2 CPUs)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia/AMD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Catalina
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 Dual-Core @ 2.3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus Graphics 640 1536 MB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
